name: 6lowpan
tagline: An implementation of 6LowPAN protocol, compatible with Contiki OS.
body:
### Usage
  This guide will help you simply run a 6lowpan stack on your IOT device or any other software project.    
  explanations are separated by header files. i have included any header file that i felt it need to be explained.

## glue.h Insides:
  include glue.h, so entire library will be available in your project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
